sentence.Network_en: Today its executive committee voted unanimously to reject the proposals.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天执行委员会投票一致否决了这些提案。

sentence.Network_en: Its members had come out virtually unanimously against the tests.
sentence.Network_cn: 会员们几乎一致表示反对这些测试。

sentence.Network_en: The Board of Directors has approved the decision unanimously.
sentence.Network_cn: 董事会成员一致批准了该项决定。

entry.tran: （所有人）一致同意的，全体一致的，无异议的
entry.def: When a group of people are unanimous, they all agree about something or all vote for the same thing.

example.ex: Editors were unanimous in their condemnation of the proposals...
example.tran: 编辑人员一致谴责这些提议。

example.ex: They were unanimous that Chortlesby Manor must be preserved.
example.tran: 他们一致认为必须对乔特勒斯比庄园加以保护。

entry.tran: （投票、决定、协议等）全体同意的，无异议的，一致通过的
entry.def: A unanimous vote, decision, or agreement is one in which all the people involved agree.

example.tran: 投票一致同意匈牙利成为会员国
他们的决定是全体一致通过的。

auth_sentence.content: UN Security Council votes unanimously to impose tougher sanctions.
auth_sentence.res_content: UN Security Council votes unanimously to impose tougher sanctions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: UN Security Council votes unanimously to impose tougher sanctions.

auth_sentence.content: June - Parliament votes unanimously to allow multi-party politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: June - Parliament votes unanimously to allow multi-party politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: June - Parliament votes unanimously to allow multi-party politics.

auth_sentence.content: Opposition Republicans in the House voted unanimously against it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opposition Republicans in the House voted unanimously against it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opposition Republicans in the House voted unanimously against it.

sentences.en: Three judges unanimously upheld the sentence.
sentences.cn: 三名法官一致维持这个判决。

sentences.en: Following discussion, the annual report was accepted unanimously.
sentences.cn: 经过讨论，年度报告获一致通过。
